name: Aman Chunara
position: Head of BD & Sales@ Poppins Labs | B2B Growth Expert | Lead Gen | IIM L (MBA) | IIT KGP
about: Aman is a dynamic professional with a strong foundation in business and technology. He graduated from IIT Kharagpur and IIM Lucknow, which equipped him with exceptional business acumen and a strong sense of ownership. Before his MBA, Aman spent two years at Capgemini in a non-technical role within the Security Operations Center (SOC), where he developed critical insights into cybersecurity operations. Post-MBA, Aman has transitioned into sales and account management, leveraging his diverse background to drive business growth and foster client relationships. Aman is currently heading the entire sales vertical at Poppins Labs. With a proactive mindset, Aman is always eager to seize new opportunities and continuously expand his skill set. For professional connections or inquiries, please reach out to him at amanchunara@gmail.com.

current_company.name: Poppins Labs
current_company.title: Head of BD & Sales@ Poppins Labs | B2B Growth Expert | Lead Gen | IIM L (MBA) | IIT KGP

experience.title: Manager
experience.description: GyanSys is a prominent mid-sized systems integration company with a global reach. Known for its innovative approach to digital and process transformation, the company specializes in SAP and Salesforce implementations, managed services, and data analytics. We deploy advanced solutions in complex multi-cloud environments, enabling companies to streamline operations and boost return on investment.With a team of over 2,000 experts, GyanSys is headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana, and operates from multiple delivery centers across the globe.If you're interested in exploring technology solutions to simplify your business processes and unlock new value, please feel free to contact me.

experience.title: Summer Research Intern
experience.description: ▪️ Purified P-43, an important constituent of Multi-aaRS complex in plasmodium falciparum using Ni-NTA, Heparin, and gel permeation chromatography to explore the possibility of MSC as possible therapeutic anti-malarial target				▪️ Ligand binding studies using amino-acylation assay and thermal shift assay were performed with potential drugs and enzyme for efficient binding.

recommendations: Vikas Sahoo “Aman joined my team as a Management Trainee in Security domain. Aman’s IIT & IIM stellar education and experience make him a detail-oriented person who also carries the business acumen required to understand high-level business programs. He was the go-to guy when it came to internal audits & Cybersecurity initiatives. He involved himself with a variety of projects, both technical as well as business-oriented. Additionally, he was instrumental in pre-sales activities, showcasing exceptional documentation and presentation skills. Aman has skillfully acquired technical expertise, complementing his existing leadership and managerial qualities. He is an internally motivated, disciplined, and persistent person. I wish him great success in his future endeavors and look forward to the possibility of working with him again.”

Bhushan Gadhari “Aman has done good work in his role of cyber security use case developer. He has been instrumental in creating and standardising logging framework baselines of various security devices. Good luck for future endeavours.”
